title: Come to the Saviour Make No Delay

author.name: George F. Root
author.bio: George F. Root was an American composer and songwriter known for his many hymns and patriotic songs. His contributions to gospel music have left a lasting legacy in Christian hymnody.

lyrics:
Come to the Saviour,
Make no delay,
Here in His word
He has shown us the way,
Here in our midst
He's standing today,
Tenderly saying, "Come."

CHORUS:
Joyful, joyful,
Will the meeting be,
When from sin our hearts
Are pure and free,
And we shall gather,
Saviour, with Thee,
In our Eternal home.

"Suffer the children,"
Oh, hear His voice,
Let every heart leap
Forth and rejoice,
And let us freely
Make Him our choice,
Do not delay, but come.

Think once again,
He's with us today,
Heed now His blest
Command, and obey
Hear now His accents
Tenderly say,
"Will you, my children, come?"
